name: Natural Boyfriend
description:
A bizarre visual novel about a lovestruck girl and the plant boy she's crushing on. Be mindful of the environment to win his leafy heart!

Features:

  • Renamable protagonists
  • Stat-based gameplay
  • 3 endings
  • Fluffy but weird storyline?

Created by Frances Calceta, Andrea Limkinglam, and JM Manalo during the #define hackathon last Feb. 27-28, 2016.
